Introduction

Yun Siyun is a South Korean actor, dancer, and singer under FNC Entertainment. He made his official debut on November 15, 2023 as a member of the boy group AMPERS&ONE. Prior to his debut, he appeared on the YG survival show "YG Treasure Box".
